titles.title: Recognizing and commemorating St. Joseph's School and their service to the El Paso community.
Recognizing and commemorating St. Joseph's School and their service to the El Paso community.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: Commemorates the founding of St. Joseph's School in El Paso, Texas, and recognizes the school's service to its community.
